item.title: Docker/Kubernetes outside your room
item.author: VonC
item.description:
Docker/K8s outside your room

Context

You want to quickly test a docker image from an editor, say Artifactory.
Since you don’t want to install all the pre-requisites for a Artifactory server to run, you pull the image, and docker run its container.

And it works!

Even better, and upgrade is as easy as docker stop/pull/start!

That is… until you deploy the same setup in your enterprise.
Then everything is more complex.

Outside your room

This talk is about the difficulties you will face when deploying a containerized application in an enterprise, namely:

  • proxy
  • certificates
  • root user
  • data persistence
